page_content:
New Reports - Summary Report

Version:MissionOS_2.0

A new Web Report is configured by first clicking Report Creation > Batched Reports, then navigating to the New Reports tab. (the web reports created here are different from the web reports generated from the Homepage Instrument Data interface).

 

 

 

 

The Report Type drop-down contains 3 items listed as Report Types:

  • Individual Report
  • Summary Report
  • Graph Report

 

To create a new summary report, perform the following steps:

  1. Select the option Summary Report from the Report Type drop-down field.
  2. In the Title field, type the desired title for the Report.
  3. Select from the Instruments section any one of the following options:
  • All Instruments of the following
  • Selected Instruments

If you select All Instruments of the following, new fields appear as drop-downs. Select from the drop-downs as required:

  • Object Class Type
  • Object Classes
  • Type
  • Subtype
  • Project
  • Contract
  • Site
  • Zone

 

 

  1. Select from the Date Range options as given below:
  • Last 1 day
  • Last 3 days
  • Last 1 week
  • Last 2 weeks
  • Last 1 month
  • Last 3 months
  • Or select days from-to manually.
  • Recent readings
  • Specific dates (if you select this option, place the cursor in the field below to select the required dates)

 

 

 

  1. Select from either of the following checkboxes:
  • Grouping not required
  • Instruments grouping by Review levels
  1. Select the checkbox Exclude instruments without data if required.
  2. Select the checkbox Choose additional fields, if required.
    1. Select Definition/Setup from the corresponding drop-down menu.
    2. Select the required Definition/Setup fields.
    3. Click Add Definition/Setup Fields to confirm selection

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

  1. Choose Graph Template, based on preference.
  2. Select from the following checkboxes, if required:
  • Hide AAA lines
  • Group graphs of all instruments
  1. Choose Report Template from the drop-down.

Note:

Report template populates from that created under Tables tab in Object Definition interface. For more information on creating Tables template, refer to the manual Table Template Creation (Normal Instruments)

 

  1. Click Choose File under Choose Images to upload corresponding images. Then click Upload.
  2. Finally, click Save Report.
    The Report gets saved and listed under the Reports’ Library tab, and New Binder

 

 

 

 

  1. To view the report, go to the Reports’ Library
  2. Type the title of the report in the Search field, then click Search. Or scroll down to see the newly created Report.
  3. Click the Web Report button to view the report in another browser tab.

 

 

 

 

 

In the New Binder tab, you can select the newly created listed report and attach it to a new binder.

 

 

 

The Binder Report once created is listed under the Binders’ Library tab. Click the arrow on the new Binder to see the attached report. You can further add reports as desired using the Add Reports button.

You can send the Binder Report as email (Send E-mail button) or schedule as required.
